info.name: Dark Osu!
info.description: An attempt at a darker, easier on the eye version of the Osu! website.
info.additionalInfo:
0.0 Released I don't know how to do this yet.
0.1 Working on a general theme for main page. Will continue through rest of site.
1.0 Finished but unpolished.
1.1 Updating userpage text color to black.
1.2 Update color of Add Friend button and darken the spoiler box background for visible text on userpages.
1.3 Fix user search results invisible.
1.4 Dark background for beatmap information to read text + Darken top of webpage to get rid of leftover pink.
1.5 Darkened background for blog posts.
